overview: PATCHING TOPIAS is an animated essay, which addresses collapsology and collapse theories of industrial civilization. While entangling documentary and autobiographical approaches, this animated film traces the different intellectual and emotional paths crossed during a long journey in "Collapsotopia". Its artisanal and solitary manufacturing is part of a desire for low-tech self–sufficiency adapted to the context of its realization – first confinement - as well as its object.
title: Patching Topias
